Package engine.forBoard

package engine.forBoard

  • Class
    Description
    Board
    The Board class represents a chess board containing 64 tiles and thirty-two pieces at the start of the game.
    Board.Builder
    A builder class for constructing instances of the Board class with specific configurations.
    BoardUtils
    The BoardUtils class provides methods for checking valid tile coordinates and converting between positions and coordinates.
    Move
    The `Move` class represents a move in a game of chess.
    Move.AttackMove
    The `AttackMove` class represents a move that results in attacking an opponent's piece in chess.
    Move.CastleMove
    The `CastleMove` class represents a move that involves castling, which is a special king and rook move.
    Move.KingSideCastleMove
    The `KingSideCastleMove` class represents a move for king-side castling in chess.
    Move.MajorAttackMove
    The `MajorAttackMove` class represents a major attack move in chess.
    Move.MajorMove
    The `MajorMove` class represents a standard major move in chess.
    Move.MoveFactory
    Represents a factory for creating moves.
    Move.MoveStatus
    Represents the possible outcomes of a chess move, including successful execution, an illegal move, or leaving the player's king in check.
    Move.NullMove
    The `NullMove` class represents a placeholder for no move in a chess game.
    Move.PawnAttackMove
    The `PawnAttackMove` class represents a pawn attack move in chess.
    Move.PawnEnPassantAttack
    The `PawnEnPassantAttack` class represents a special pawn attack move called "en passant" in chess.
    Move.PawnJump
    The `PawnJump` class represents a pawn move where a pawn advances two squares from its starting position.
    Move.PawnMove
    The `PawnMove` class represents a basic pawn move in chess.
    Move.PawnPromotion
    The `PawnPromotion` class represents a special move in chess.
    Move.QueenSideCastleMove
    The `QueenSideCastleMove` class represents a move for queen-side castling in chess.
    MoveTransition
    The `MoveTransition` class represents a transition between two chess board states resulting from a specific move.
    MoveUtils
    The `MoveUtils` class is a utility class that provides various helper methods related to chess moves and calculations.
    MoveUtils.Line
    The Line class represents a sequence of integer coordinates forming a line.
    Tile
    The `Tile` class represents a tile on a chess board.
    Tile.EmptyTile
    The EmptyTile class represents an empty tile on a chess board.
    Tile.OccupiedTile
    The OccupiedTile class represents an occupied tile on a chess board.
